summary: A gay thirty year old lives at home and is in the midst of a serious creative funk. Rejected by numerous art schools and lacking romantic prospects, he looks to his charismatic Uncle Alfred for inspiration.
cast: Alexis Arquette|Georgia Ragsdale|Margot Kidder|Don McKellar|Keith David|Alvin Epstein|Omewenne|Diane Beckett|Craig Hickman|David Levine|John O'Callaghan|Jody O'Neil|Edward Stanley|Ursula Ryan|Richard Snee|Adrienne Starrs|Suzanne Crosby|Laney Fichera|Lakia Norwood|Verna Turbulence|Stephanie Whyte|Mike Eastman|S. Miria Jo|John P. Russo
